title: A Few Better Raw Old Judges for Sale--Final Reduction
author: oldjudge

posts.post_title: A Few Better Raw Old Judges for Sale--Final Reduction
posts.post_content:
All cards guaranteed to grade with a numerical grade. If interested, please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks--Jay

1. Ward--great image of one of the most significant figures in 19th century baseball on this scarcer horizontal pose. Small chip in UR corner, undamaged back.------SOLD
2. McCarthy--another great image of this very marginal HOFer. Indentation at right. Back has interesting stamp" BRANCH./ 605 Washington Ave./ Sep 18 1888" also has pose number written in pencil by a past OJ scholar.---SOLD
3. Duffy--underrated HOFer. Card has pinkish tint although image not bad. Back has what looks like an area of pen ink staining but is undamaged---SOLD
4. Browns Champ Nicholl--nice card with a small stain left and a horizontal crease. Back has a small stain from scrapbook removal--$235

One time price reduction for those on the fence.

Thanks--Jay
Final price reduction on these cards--don't miss out.
Last chance before these get taken down
